ygData.subject: re-starting advise
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, I the past I have received excellent advise from this list so I turn to you again... I quit playing my bard at level 30 ( this was about 6 months
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,
I the past I have received excellent advise from this list so I turn to you
again...
I quit playing my bard at level 30 ( this was about 6 months ago) stripped
him of all items and started a Mage the mage is now level 46 and I would now
like to stat playing him again, I have a few items for him but mostly need
to buy/camp new gear...I'm all set for weapons and instruments. I need
armor/jewelry suggestions that a 46th mage could acquire with out much help.
I have about 1k saved up. On the bard I have a troll belt(+5 STR), Star ruby
Face(+5 DEX/CHA), Dark Elf Hide Gloves(I forget stats). Also he is a 1/2 elf
with a starting STR of 90 and CHA of 85 I know I messed up but it was my
first toon<shrug>.
On a side note any suggestions of where to solo are welcome I know the good
group spots but am a bit out of shape soloing with out a pet :-)
Any help you can give I'd be most thankful for.

Pinen 30th bard
Maxius 46th mage


--------------------------------------------
It is by caffeine alone I set my mind in motion.
It is by the Beans of Java that thoughts acquire speed,
the hands acquire shaking, the shaking becomes an e-mail.
It is by caffeine alone I set my mind in motion.
--------------------------------------------
